Detailed Description

A scene consisting of Scene Objects.

Member Function Documentation

◆ addComponent()

bool rev::Scene::addComponent ( Component *  component)

Add component to the scene object.

Returns true if component successfully added

◆ clear()

void rev::Scene::clear ( )

Clear the scene.

Removes all scene objects from static map

◆ removeObject()

void rev::Scene::removeObject ( std::shared_ptr< SceneObject >  object,
bool  eraseFromTopLevel = true 
)

Remove an object from the scene entirely.

Note
Need to pass pointer as a value, so ref count doesn't hit zero and cause problems
